channel.title: Really
channel.description:
It's time for mitb to update the staff.
Now that JDB is gone[All aware of what happened] mscp is left to ikilki once again. I really think mscp needs to have an update with mods, because one isn't going to cut it. *Don't flame on this point, or say delete mscp lool0l0l*
Now, when this whole event was happening, Niall was most likely asleep[For his timezone] and Lothy was most likely Roo sighting, or some other activity[seeing as it was mid day in Australia], and seeing as these are really the only active mods nothing could be done till they got on.
Personally, I think Niall and Lothy should be bumped up a rank, seeing as they are pretty active and we know we can trust them[no matter how much some people don't like them, I think we can agree on that.]
Also, some more Globals, this might be a harder thing because of what happened with jdb's poor actions. Maybe if you feel there aren't people who can be trusted, create a new user group and select some people to use it, this user group being able to lock topics, etc...or maybe warn etc[but not ban]
Finally, the ban of dragonus18 who appeared wasn't banned, and accepted a mod account from jdb(I was offered one but I denied)
kthx

item.title: Really
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:44, topic:174414”][quote author=Nerice link=topic=234849.msg2007123#msg2007123 date=1200923465]

As I told JDB today when I talked to him on IRC. That is the worst excuse I have ever seen, it is something I would expect to hear from a 9 year old. Following his logic of ‘I destroyed the forums so you would get more staff’, if I think JDB should run his site on a dedicated server, then I should get raw to ddos his site so that he has to right? It’s just stupid. Good did come of it though, we got rid of a few bad apples (JDB and Copyright being the main two)

I am still here though. Hi mopar. ;D
[/quote]
no im still here. and im a bad apple. lets keep it that way.[/quote]

The fact that you are proud of it is utterly disturbing.

Read full topic

item.title: Really
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:38, topic:174414”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=234849.msg2006818#msg2006818 date=1200906970]
This happened all because we rushed. JBD’, like thuglife said, became a mod way to quickly. Pwnd, why did he quit though? Imo, thuglife also should become a gm, then we would be set for a while. And we need people to be able to contact admins, to ban accounts, or to restore sections.
[/quote]
Pwnd got de-modded for deleting half of moparscape.[/quote]
i knew that, but pwnd did a good action. imo thats was good. Wiping out moparscape was good. But, i don’t see why he did it, as responsible as he is, is site still up, and dosen’t lead to m3at spin, so i don’t know.

item.title: Really
item.dc:creator: @logginsloggin logginsloggin
item.description:
@logginsloggin wrote:

Well, I’m sure glad that what I hoped would happen did. It’s just a shame I had to sacrifice myself for change to finally happen and I hope that these changes make this community even better, the reason I did what I did is not to ruin the community because there would’ve been much better ways to proceed in doing that, but rather I did it hoping it would stir some change up because the way I saw it the community wasn’t even worth being part of with the amount of shit people got away with, so I did this hoping it would cause you to make more staff members, which it did xD

Thuglife, sorry for being a dick to you but I didn’t plan on letting anyone know why I did this therefore I needed to cause something that would look like a reason for my actions.

Sorry MITB/MSCP for what I did, I do not expect to be unbanned or forgiven but I feel that I owe an apology.

Last but not least, Thank you MITB and MSCP community for all of the great times I will never forget them xD

So long and Take care!!!

JDB`

P.S. Congratulations Evil_ and sppt on your new positions and good luck, also not that my opinion matters anymore but Niall and Lothy would both aid you well as administrators mopar

Read full topic

item.title: Really
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

iceburster:

what even happened? someone pm it to me plz lol

Moparisthebest:

As to what the fake moderators did, it wasn’t that bad. Thank God for moderation logs <3 There was one ban made that I deleted, about 400 topics were moved which a carefully crafted MySQL query and a few lines of PHP fixed, and 1200 topics were deleted, all but 265 of which I automatically restored with some php hackery, and Lothy manually restored the rest. So we actually lost nothing except for a few bad eggs, which is good anytime.

Read full topic

item.title: Really
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

billygotshot:

I agree aswell on lothy and niall being bumped. As far as i know they do their jobs pretty well considering what other mods do. Also mopar mods are pretty bad. There are no really good mods there except ilikili who i dont really like -.-

Thanks

[quote=“ThugLife, post:6, topic:174414”]Well normally i would sit here pointing out all the things God of ikiliki does wrong, but since all this stuff has happened recently i must say:
At least he is trustworthy.[/quote]
Thanks

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:22, topic:174414”]Like frank_ said, a public nomination for moderators would become a popularity contest instead of an ability contest, so that won’t happen.

As to what the fake moderators did, it wasn’t that bad. Thank God for moderation logs <3 There was one ban made that I deleted, about 400 topics were moved which a carefully crafted MySQL query and a few lines of PHP fixed, and 1200 topics were deleted, all but 265 of which I automatically restored with some php hackery, and Lothy manually restored the rest. So we actually lost nothing except for a few bad eggs, which is good anytime.

You can all rest assured however that I have everything locked down now, no one can create accounts that are anything but regular, I now store a board_id in the moderation log for every deleted topic, and I will shortly have a script running that makes a full backup of the forum every 2 days and keeps the last 5 in storage. In short nothing can happen to the forum that a few simple SQL queries will not fix. I now have everything I need to make a simple undo function that undoes all actions from any staff during any date range I wish.

As far as staff changes go, a few of those were made while I was at it, starblaster and ron are now ex-staff, taharok is no longer a moparscape mod and we now have sppt as a gmod and evil_ has joined the ranks of the moparscape moderators.

More changes are forthcoming, including a new state-of-the-art highly efficient banning system, and a few other things that will make moderation easier and therefore a better forum.[/quote]That was easy.
He just said “maybe mopar can set me up as a Moparscape Moderator” and he gets it, I should try that.
Evil_, help me with some reports please

Read full topic

item.title: Really
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Like frank_ said, a public nomination for moderators would become a popularity contest instead of an ability contest, so that won’t happen.

As to what the fake moderators did, it wasn’t that bad. Thank God for moderation logs <3 There was one ban made that I deleted, about 400 topics were moved which a carefully crafted MySQL query and a few lines of PHP fixed, and 1200 topics were deleted, all but 265 of which I automatically restored with some php hackery, and Lothy manually restored the rest. So we actually lost nothing except for a few bad eggs, which is good anytime.

You can all rest assured however that I have everything locked down now, no one can create accounts that are anything but regular, I now store a board_id in the moderation log for every deleted topic, and I will shortly have a script running that makes a full backup of the forum every 2 days and keeps the last 5 in storage. In short nothing can happen to the forum that a few simple SQL queries will not fix. I now have everything I need to make a simple undo function that undoes all actions from any staff during any date range I wish.

As far as staff changes go, a few of those were made while I was at it, starblaster and ron are now ex-staff, taharok is no longer a moparscape mod and we now have sppt as a gmod and evil_ has joined the ranks of the moparscape moderators.

More changes are forthcoming, including a new state-of-the-art highly efficient banning system, and a few other things that will make moderation easier and therefore a better forum.

Read full topic
